Sharwan Kumar
The AMOLED display is vibranh batt long, and 80W charging is fast.
Reviewed in India on 30 July 2025
Colour: Onyx BlackSize: 6+128Verified Purchase
I've been using the Realme Narzo 80 Pro recently, and it's a solid 5G phone in this price range. The AMOLED display is vibrant, the 6000mAh battery lasts long, and 80W charging is fast. The camera performs well, though it lacks an ultra-wide lens. Performance is smooth for daily use, but it can heat up a bit during heavy tasks. Overall, it's a stylish and value-for-money device.

SANJAY KUMAR SINGH
Adapter is 15w, not fast charging
Reviewed in India on 11 September 2025
Colour: Onyx BlackSize: 6+128Verified Purchase
Performance of the phone is good but the main drawback of this phone is that the adapter is 15w which is not mentioned in product specification . It takes longer time to fully charge the phone. Now days fast charging adapter is given with the phone. Also photos clicked from the camera are not so good or outstanding. Overall the phone performance is good but not outstanding. Good for entry level or who want low budget phones.
7 people found this helpful
Helpful
Report
BD
Great Budget Phone
Reviewed in India on 26 August 2025
Colour: Crystal PurpleSize: 6+128Verified Purchase
Today completed a little more than 1 month of usage for this phone . The phone hangs although rarely . App opening is relatively fast . RAM management is ok not very good . Also rarely phone heats up when charging although heating is not much . Battery backup is great . For battery health reason , I chose the charging setting to 80% . With 80 percent I get almost 10 hrs 30 mins of continuous usage using YouTube Facebook browsing mostly and ofcourse calls . I think the battery consumption is less in wifi than sim card internet . Call quality is good , speaker has inbuilt 300% which is good for me . Catching wifi signal is not good not bad in in those places where wifi signal is low. Screen quality is ok for me after turning on eye protection , for many it may not be exciting . Camera picture and video quality is descent for a budget phone like this . For better picture video quality I use gcam which uses the phone s picture video capability in a better way . Over all no complain so far . I got this phone for 8990 /- after exchanging my previous realme narzo 21 A for 5 yrs .
35 people found this helpful

Customers find this phone to be a good value under 7k, with a sleek, slim design and crisp sound quality. The battery life receives positive feedback, with one customer noting it provides entertainment for an entire day, and the display quality impresses, with one mentioning its 90 Hz smooth scrolling and video playback. The functionality and camera quality receive mixed reviews, with some praising the performance while others report issues, and some finding the camera excellent while others describe it as average.
